description: Due to ability to identify, demonstrate and explain code approaches, I was promoted to technical lead early on a large project (2.5 million members, 800 DB tables) for civil service pensions.
Managing fixes to the core product, writing mostly generic components for 100+ workflows across two projects (pensions administration and payroll).
Successfully managing over 1500 defects raised during all stages of testing (admin only) over a small team of developers (average 6) to meet deadlines.
Trained and supported new team members to be productive in a very short time (within 2 months of deadline).
I am the 'goto' for technical support within my team and wider company. SQL, XSL, CSS, HTML and understanding VB and .NET errors particularly important.
data.address: Sutherland House, Russel Way, Crawley RH10 1UH

description: Developed various live and near-live web applications, including a contact manager, booking manager and intranet.

New code based on MSSQL, LINQ-to-SQL, VB.NET and AJAX controls. Existing code was JavaScript/jQuery intense, which I maintained with help from developer tools, such as Internet Explorer's 'F12', Fiddler and SQL Server Profiler.
Fire warden
Worked on a large ASP.NET (VB) 3.5 web application.
Responsible for a component, from functional specification and sign off to managing database changes, test data, business objects, front-end, and test methods.

Wrote helper methods and AJAX where required. Used and developed using generics, interfaces, LINQ/JSON. Developed most CSS/HTML for the site. Used 3rd party tools (OpenAccess, CodeSmith) to script and generate data access classes and documentation for the database.
data.address: Invicta House, Trafalgar Place, Brighton BN1 4FR

description: Designed the group intranet with MSSQL backend and ASP.NET (C#) business objects and front end. Used MS Office API to interface with MSExcel and MSWord.

Researched use of Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 2007 for an updated intranet and communications portal. Built a secured Windows Server 2003 server and client PC (Windows XP) for testing and development.
Built bespoke web and Windows applications; from consultation, design and development, to testing, integration into the business, and support.
Project managed a 3rd party document management project, for integration into multiple systems within the business.
Provided user support for a number of 3rd party and in-house systems.
